import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Product({product}) { return ( {/* */} {product.name}
${product.price} ) } export default Product
